doc:
Richard Moll https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Moll 0 Charles Richard Moll (born January 13, 1943) is an American actor and voice artist, best known for playing Bull Shannon, the bailiff on the NBC sitcom Night Court from 1984 to 1992. Moll has also done extensive work as a voice actor, typically using his deep voice to portray villainous characters in animation and video games. Charles_Richard_Moll ( born January_13_,_1943 ) is an_American_actor_and_voice_artist , best_known for playing Bull_Shannon , the_bailiff on the_NBC_sitcom_Night_Court from 1984 to 1992 . Moll has_also_done extensive_work as a_voice_actor , typically using his_deep_voice to_portray villainous_characters in animation_and_video_games .
